etymology.description: Pictogram: 𠂢 (original form) -> Phono-semantic: semantic 水(水) (shuǐ, "water; river") + phonetic 𠂢 = differentiation of original form with water
etymology.interpretation: The character originally depicted 𠂢 alone. To differentiate and specify meanings related to water or a flowing style, 水(水) (shuǐ, "water; river") was added as a semantic element.

examples.chinese: 我们研究传统文人派(我們研究傳統文人派)，注重文化底蕴(注重文化底蘊)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒmen yánjiū chuántǒng wénrén pài, zhùzhòng wénhuà dǐyùn.
examples.english: We study the traditional literati school, emphasizing cultural depth.

examples.chinese: 他加入了摇滚派(他加入了搖滾派)，追求自由精神(追求自由精神)。
examples.pinyin: Tā jiārùle yáogǔn pài, zhuīqiú zìyóu jīngshén.
examples.english: He joined the rock group to pursue a spirit of freedom.

examples.chinese: 古典音乐派(古典音樂派)，具有悠久历史(具有悠久歷史)。
examples.pinyin: Gǔdiǎn yīnyuè pài, jùyǒu yōujiǔ lìshǐ.
examples.english: The classical music school has a long history.
